channel.title: Deeds Without Debt
channel.description: Weekly insights on alternative real estate investing strategies including tax deeds, tax liens, and probate deals

item.title: 3 Ways to Buy Real Estate Without Banks (And Why They Work)
item.description: Discover the proven strategies I've used to acquire over $2M in real estate without traditional financing. From tax deed auctions to probate deals, here's your complete roadmap.
item.author: ralph@deedswithoutdebt.com (Ralph Biah)

item.title: How Alaska Tax Sales Work: September 2025 Borough Auction Guide
item.description: Alaska's unique borough structure creates exceptional opportunities. Here's everything you need to know about the upcoming September auction.
item.author: ralph@deedswithoutdebt.com (Ralph Biah)

item.title: Catron County Win: $17K to $120K in 18 Months
item.description: My personal case study of turning a tax deed purchase into a massive profit by subdividing 5 acres and selling the cabin separately.
item.author: ralph@deedswithoutdebt.com (Ralph Biah)

item.title: HOA Foreclosures: The Hidden Opportunity in Every City
item.description: While everyone focuses on tax sales, HOA foreclosures happen year-round with less competition and faster timelines.
item.author: ralph@deedswithoutdebt.com (Ralph Biah)
